cast.original_title: The Hunger Games: The Ballad of Songbirds & Snakes
cast.overview: 64 years before he becomes the tyrannical president of Panem, Coriolanus Snow sees a chance for a change in fortunes when he mentors Lucy Gray Baird, the female tribute from District 12.
cast.title: The Hunger Games: The Ballad of Songbirds & Snakes

details.biography: Riley is an American child actor. She lives in London with her parents, three older sisters and dog. All four girls in the family are actors. Riley has recently wrapped on Feature Films "The Hunger Games: The Ballad Of Songbirds & Snakes" 'Sunrise' and "Le Marché De Noël" Riley has Korean and European heritage.
details.name: Riley Chung
